name: GetMeMoving-SuccessLifeLessonsbytheBest
0:
”Alexa, open get me moving”
”Alexa, play get me moving”
”Alexa, ask get me moving about”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: get me moving
des:
Listen to audio clips from some of the most successful people giving you producivity, motivation, valuable life lessons, gratitude, business tips, awareness, optimism, inspiration, reminders, mindset and so much more. 
 
 Many of us face times where they just can't seem to find the energy, motivation, inspiration to get done what they need to be doing. Maybe you are an entrepreneur or just need to live a more successful life, sometimes just a sutle reminder from the people that do it the very best in the world is exactly what you may need to push you and get you moving. But this skill does not offer just that, open your ears for lessons in life and business, practicality, help with mindset, and the list goes on and on. Things to make you and the people around you better. 
 
 People like Gary Vaynerchuk, Tony Robbins, Arnold Schwarzenegger, David Goggins, Joe Rogan, and so many more give the perfect advice to inspire, motivate, and push you to be the best you can be. Having these influential people inspire and motivate you by saying just a few words will change how you go about your day. Truly the ultimate productivity, gratitude, motivation, inspiring tool that anyone looking for success can use in their life and get value from. 
 
 COMMANDS: 
 
 
 - Play a Random Audio Clip -------> "Alexa, open get me moving" 
 - Get Information About Audio Clip -------> "Alexa, ask get me moving about" 
 - Play the Next Random Clip -------> "Alexa, next" 
 - Pause the Clip -------> "Alexa, pause" 
 - Stop the Skill -------> "Alexa, stop" 
 
 
 Special thanks to all of the creators and speakers that made this skill possible, helping the lives of many. We ALL thank you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
